__e: We talked for a long time, and all he kept saying was how depressed he was and how his life had no meaning.
I found him here... two hours after his shift had ended, and he was on the phone with some 14-year-old girl who was depressed and thinking about hurting herself.
All I know is that I was depressed before and now I found meaning!
Most days I'm so depressed I can't even get out of bed.
No matter how depressed I get, the final question I ask myself is... what would I like to do different?
Honestly, I get so depressed, there are entire weeks that I can't even get out of bed.
Now I feel like killing myself... but luckily, I'm too depressed to bother.
And now I'm too depressed to even look at it, okay?
I've been too depressed to work recently.
